content: In what country did the sport of soccer (football) originate?

The sport of soccer, also known as football in many parts of the world, has its origins in various forms of football that were played in different cultures throughout history. However, the modern game of association football, which is what we commonly refer to as soccer, was formalized in England in the mid-19th century. So, England is widely recognized as the birthplace of the modern sport of soccer.
